net.pocorall.automaton.LinkedAutomaton

      Subclasses of LinkedAutomaton in net.pocorall.automaton 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultAutomaton
      Finite-state automaton with regular expression operations.
      Methods in net.pocorall.automaton that return LinkedAutomaton 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LinkedAutomaton LinkedAutomaton.clone()
      Returns a clone of this automaton.
      LinkedAutomaton LinkedAutomaton.minimize()
      Minimizes (and determinizes if not already deterministic) the given automaton.
      Methods in net.pocorall.automaton with parameters of type LinkedAutomaton 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void BasicOperations.addEpsilons(LinkedAutomaton a, Collection<StatePair> pairs)
      Adds epsilon transitions to the given automaton.
      static void BasicOperations.determinize(LinkedAutomaton a)
      Determinizes the given automaton.
      static void MinimizationOperations.minimizeBrzozowski(LinkedAutomaton a)
      Minimizes the given automaton using Brzozowski's algorithm.
      static void MinimizationOperations.minimizeHopcroft(LinkedAutomaton a)
      Minimizes the given automaton using Hopcroft's algorithm.
      static void MinimizationOperations.minimizeHuffman(LinkedAutomaton a)
      Minimizes the given automaton using Huffman's algorithm.
      static Set<State> SpecialOperations.reverse(LinkedAutomaton a)
      Reverses the language of the given (non-singleton) automaton while returning the set of new initial states.
